title: URF sails off with Party IP in its wake

Please give us URF on Fridays!

i have a few game modes to suggest, You say NURF: No Ultimate Rapid fire, stops people like, {{champion:81}} {{champion:105}}{{champion:55}} {{champion:13}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:45}} {{champion:110}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:17}} from being so OP in the game mode,
what about Nerf, Never ending rapid fire, like this:
MANA AND ENERGY COST All ability costs reduced to 0
COOLDOWN REDUCTION 100% on abilities, 80% on activated items and summoner spells
MOVEMENT SPEED +100 for all champions
TENACITY 30% for all champions
ATTACK SPEED BONUSES Bonuses given by items/abilities increased by 100% on ranged/ 50% melee champions
CRITICAL STRIKE DAMAGE Increased by 25% of base damage on ranged champions 15% on melee champions
GOLD GAIN +1000% of the amount normally granted on Summoner's Rift

basically a clusterfuck game mode where battles end in a blink of an eye? what do you guys think?
Have all of the above but have 70% reduced damage for all champs, would be cray, lol.
hahah so tru
wat? wat's this..... MANA.... you speak of...
actually URF fridays is a whoop ass idea
we really want URF back
I lost all skills in league now that urf is gone, how do I 'save mana'?

URF
